summary: REQ-1 is implemented by adding responsive bottom padding to the `<main>` element in `AppShell.tsx` (`pb-24 md:pb-6`) to prevent content from being obscured by the fixed `MobileBottomNav` on small screens. However, the diff also modifies files beyond the allowed scope, violating the constraint to apply changes only to the selected `<main>` element.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified files outside the allowed scope (changes not limited to the selected `<main>` element in `AppShell.tsx`).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest constraint requires applying changes ONLY to `/html/body/div/div/main` in `frontend/src/components/layout/AppShell.tsx`; the diff shows additional modified files.

hallucinated_features.description: Added `safe-area-bottom` class to `<main>` without any request or supporting change shown to define/ensure this class exists.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-1 only asks to ensure bottom content is not obscured; the diff introduces an additional class beyond the requested padding adjustment, and no corresponding CSS/util definition is evidenced in the provided diff summary.
